name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a media outlet revealed that a primary school in Zhengyang County, Henan Province, had a notice in the student milk subscription that said "actively order if conditions permit, create conditions if conditions permit". Some parents showed the content of the notice to reporters and said that initially it was 440 yuan to order 4 boxes, and only a dozen families participated in the order.
Another student revealed that the teacher had urged parents to participate in the order through students many times. The student said: "If you don't order, (the teacher) will call, and my teacher said that we have to order." When asked about the consequences of not ordering, a parent present said "If you don't order, it will be bad for the children."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xu Jijun, a columnist for Russia Today and former editor-in-chief of Global Finance, who entered Mariupol with Wang Fang, published "Mariupol people reveal the truth about the opera house tragedy" on his public account "Han Tang Think Tank".
He said that "(the Ukrainian army took the people in the theater) as hostages to threaten the Russian army not to attack. Later, (the Ukrainian army) created an explosion and falsely accused it of being a missile, but experts said that the explosion could only be from the bottom up..."
Although he said that the theater was detonated by the Ukrainian army from inside the theater, we can see the shocking tragedy in the theater after the bombing from his video.
In addition, the video also recorded the official shooting of Wang Fang's singing. In this version, Wang Fang was standing in the ruins with her head held high and her chest held high, singing loudly. It is speculated that it should be the material originally planned to be filmed for cutting into the promotional video, and the version previously circulated on the Internet was the vocal practice version.

content: Recently, a post on Xiaohongshu titled "Take Mom to Remove IUD" reminded many netizens of the hardships their mothers went through during the family planning period.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 9, Zhejiang
A girl fainted in the classroom, and no one came forward to help her. Finally, the girl struggled to get up and sit up
In this indifferent society, "don't meddle in other people's business" may be the first life lesson that Chinese parents teach their children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The military training schedule on the official website of Hainan Vocational and Technical College shows that the normal daily military training time is from 6:20 am to 9:00 pm

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, a video of Li Jiaqi angrily scolding the audience in the live broadcast room went viral in China. In the video, when a netizen questioned the increasing price of a domestic eyebrow pencil brand he was selling, Li Jiaqi suddenly started to scold: "It's difficult for domestic brands. They have been 79 yuan for so many years. How is it expensive? Sometimes you should look for your own reasons. Have your salary increased over the years? Have you worked hard? Is that okay?" This caused many netizens in the live broadcast room to break down

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 10, at the Yangzhou Guazhou Music Festival, a fan was pinned to the ground by a group of police officers for laying out a picnic mat and lighting a hand-held smoke screen. In the past, hand-held smoke screens and picnic mats were common items at music festivals.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many Tianjin netizens submitted articles saying that Tianjin Public Transport has not paid wages for several months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens have discovered that the videos of Wang Fang singing at the Mariupol Theater have basically disappeared from Station B.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In today's episode, I want to talk about the topic of "political depression".
The political depression of Chinese people is not so much depression as despair for their own political rights. It is the feeling of powerlessness we feel when facing what is happening to us.
In my opinion, it was Peng Zaizhou who gave me strength during the most severe and painful period of my political depression. I did not expect that there would be people in this era who would awaken the nation at the cost of themselves.
In my observation, from the tragedy and requests for help of the lockdown in various places in last year's submissions to the protests and demonstrations all over the country in this year's submissions, I realized that the civic consciousness of some people is gradually awakening, and this is where hope lies.
I once said in an interview with Reuters during the White Paper Movement
Compared to changing dynasties, it is more important to cultivate the civic consciousness of the people. If there is no civic consciousness, then no matter how the dynasties change, the ones who will eventually come to power are just emperors one after another.
Only when most people in this society have civic consciousness, will this country really have hope.
And this is my dream and the mission I set for myself.
Let’s talk about “political depression” and my experience fighting political depression [Teacher Li is not your teacher]

content: On September 9, at a scenic spot in Xiangyang, Hubei, thousands of Chinese tourists were unable to watch the show due to waiting for 11 foreign tourists, which triggered a heated discussion on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Let's start a fight!
Zhou Xiaoping published a public article, denouncing "a little internet celebrity named Hu Xijin"
With a picture of a dog that looks like Hu Xijin
Later, it was deleted and reposted because it involved the Urumqi fire
Did not dare to mention Hu Xijin's full name, did not dare to mention the Xinjiang fire
But dared to directly display the flag of the Republic of China in the picture
It can be said that the Zhou couple really pressed the national sentiments of the Chinese nation to the ground and rubbed them repeatedly.
